ai.summary: The Blackthorn Trail is a short, easy 1.3 km walk in the UK, ideal for families and casual hikers. The route offers gentle terrain, light scenery, and a relaxed pace.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, well-trodden path with a mix of compacted earth and gravel. Occasional roots or grassy edges and potential muddy spots after rain; some gentle inclines but no steep sections.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather and wear sturdy, comfortable footwear. Stay on marked paths, supervise children and pets, and carry water. Bring a map or a phone with offline access and a means of navigation. Be mindful of uneven surfaces and mud after rain; observe local guidelines and respect wildlife. If walking near dusk, carry a light and stay visible.
recommended_gear: Comfortable walking shoes or lightweight hiking shoes
Weather-appropriate clothing and a light layer
Map or offline route info / fully charged phone
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with especially pleasant conditions in spring and autumn. Summer can be warm but mild; winter may be muddy or icy depending on weather.

seo.title: Blackthorn Trail: Easy 1.3 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore the Blackthorn Trail, a gentle 1.3 km walk in the UK. Learn about the terrain, safety tips, gear, and the best seasons for this easy hike.
